body:
> Write a wrapper for Selenium that has a similar API as its built-in select stuff, but that actually ends up simulating clicks on the Ant non-select UI. I mildly think this is the better option.

+1. 

I think it is weird to be writing components to match the tests rather than the other way around. We should only be building our own components if the included ones are broken or un-testable. I don't think either is the case here.
